testsuite.name: LastPencilTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #24
When the player provides the correct initial game conditions and if Vergil goes first, your program should print 5 non-empty lines in such order: 2 for Vergil 1 for Vergil's move 2 for Dante
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
How many pencils would you like to use? > 2 Who will be the first (Dante, Vergil) > DanteVergil Choose between Dante and Vergil > DanteVergil Choose between Dante and Vergil > DanteVergil Choose between Dante and Vergil > DanteVergil Choose between Dante and Vergil > DanteVergil Choose between Dante and Vergil > Vergil || Vergil's turn
